Address.Address1: Gaziler Caddesi No.206; Kapilar; Basmane; Konak; Zmir

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Tempo Residence Comfort in Izmir (Izmir City Centre), you'll be convenient to Izmir International Fair and Konak Square. This 4.5-star aparthotel is within close proximity of Basmane Square and Kulturpark.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 28 guestrooms, featuring kitchens. LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Basmane Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Tempo Residence Comfort is Izmir (ADB-Adnan Menderes) - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
